column2: The sharp decline of my power and territories have not gone unnoticed by other rulers. While I continue to insist on my claims to Imperial dignity, it is clear that my peers no longer take them seriously.
Following a faith completely different from Catholicism, I cannot legitimately claim to be Latin Emperor.
Following a faith completely different from Orthodoxy, I cannot legitimately claim to be Byzantine Emperor.
Following a faith completely different from Catholicism, I cannot legitimately claim to be Holy Roman Emperor.
